name: 2023 The 2nd Asia Power and Electrical Technology Conference
content: Conference Proceedings: Accepted and presented papers will be published by conference proceedings, which will be online and indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus. 【SCI Journal】 Selected papers of APET 2023 will be invited to prepare extended version to: Protection and Control of Modern Power Systems • ISSN: 2367-2617 • Journal Rank: Q1 • Impact Factor: 10.5 • Indexing: SCI, Ei, Scopus
